attributes.action: Give people who live in rural areas a fuel tax rebate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give people who live in rural areas such as Lincolnshire a rebate on fuel tax, Many of us have no viable public transport option and the roads are too dangerous for bicycles due to potholes,lack of street lighting,tractors and HGV's. Jobs in rural areas tend to be the lowest paid (mostly minimum wage) and we we are being unfairly penalized to the point were there will soon be no point in going to work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
